src:
Story behind the photo: Reverse gear
02 Nov 2019, 00:30 by Bangalore Mirror Bureau
Our reader captured this picture of a child sitting on a bike with his back to the rider in RT NagarThe picture was clicked by reader SATISH ACHARYAIf you have a picture and a story to share, send us the picture with your name and number at mybangaloremirror@timesgroup.com
